channel.title: How can i give options where portals tele u?
channel.description: like have a message come up in the chat box when usen the duel ring

item.title: How can i give options where portals tele u?
item.dc:creator: @killa12345 killa12345
item.description:
@killa12345 wrote:

i know how to make portals work , but i mean how can i give the player options where the portal will tele them to… like when they click the portal a menu will come up in the chat box and give them 2 options where to tele to like the ring of dueling would give the player options to tele to c wars or duel arena

ive seen it in other servers to

Read full topic
item.source: How can i give options where portals tele u?

item.title: How can i give options where portals tele u?
item.dc:creator: @a_pirate a pirate
item.description:
@a_pirate wrote:

i no how it take a min 2 say lol[br][size=1]Posted on: May 03, 2007, 12:23:43 AM[/size][hr]when u tele though a portal what does it say eg “welcome to cwars!” if that is what it says go to a file called client and do ctrl+f and find “welcome to cwars!” and it would say somthing like this teleportToX = 2373;
teleportToY = 3130;
addItem(4515,1);
addItem(4516,1);
addItem(4070,1);
addItem(4072,1);
addItem(4071,1);
addItem(4069,1);
addItem(4068,1);
heightLevel = 1;
break;
after it where it says teleport x and y change to what you want[br][size=1]Posted on: May 03, 2007, 12:25:34 AM[/size][hr]thats how u change where to but i dk about rings sear duelaring in the client

Read full topic
